
>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE=====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry"><span style="font-variant: small-caps;">Hotho, Andreas</span> ; <span style="font-variant: small-caps;">Benz, Dominik</span> ; <span style="font-variant: small-caps;">Eisterlehner, Folke</span> ; <span style="font-variant: small-caps;">Jäschke, Robert</span></div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" version="1.0" demote-non-dropping-particle="sort-only" default-locale="de-DE">
  <info />
  <bibliography hanging-indent="true" et-al-min="9" et-al-use-first="9">
    <layout>
      <names variable="author" delimiter=" ; ">
        <name name-as-sort-order="all" sort-separator=", " delimiter=" ; " delimiter-precedes-last="always" font-variant="small-caps"/>
        <label form="short" prefix=" (" suffix=")"/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL======<<

>>===== INPUT =====>>
